name: 灵魂筹码 - 安琪星辰夜幕礼服 Soul at Stake - "Glad You Came" Angie's Dress
detailed_description:
GLAD YOU CAME

Angie's "Glad You Came" dress DLC includes The Wavy Long, The Charmer, The Galaxy, and The Night.


Sun Goes Down - the Wavy Long

The hairstyle filled with maturity and romance. Once the sun goes down, the late night of Shanghai is about to shine.

Fall On Me - the Charmer

Lead you on with my look. Fool you with my smile. My charm is my camouflage.

Stars Come Out - the Galaxy

The night is lit by the phenomenal Milky Way, but where might I find the shred of light for my heart?

Lights Out - the Night

Tango in the shadow, no audience, no amour.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a chase and slash game mode that uses sharp or blunt weapons, the screen will have a blood splash effect on a successful attack and during the execution event. The setting option "Bloody Mode" is available in the game. Turning off the "Bloody Mode" can remove the blood effects and has a mosaic occlusion when executed.
